forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Rain Showers then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 2pm, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms between 2pm and 5pm. Partly sunny. High near 81, with temperatures falling to around 77 in the afternoon. North wind 8 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
